Package jcolibri.extensions.textual.representation

Standard Text Representation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DataFilter This class stores data in a general way using a hashtable instead of class attributes.
Paragraph This class represents a Paragraph.
Sentence This class represents a Sentence.
Text This class represents a Text.
Token This class represents a Token.
WeightedRelation This class represents a weighted relation between two tokens.
 

Package jcolibri.extensions.textual.representation Description

Standard Text Representation.

Texts are composed by Paragraphs, Paragraphs by Sentences, and Sentences by Tokens.
